t: Luke 21
The Widow’s Gift
And*p He looked up and saw the rich putting their gifts into the treasury.
And He saw a poor widow putting in two small copper coins.
And He said, “Truly*r I*r say*r to*r you,*r this*r poor*r widow*r put*r in*r more*r than*r all*r of*ir them;*ir

Now*p during the day He was teaching in the temple, but at evening He would go out and spend the night on the mount that is called Olivet.
